group_1.textRight: They all pulled back like a wave...@Perhaps they thought they had no chance.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm... They didn't seem scared to me, though.
Hey, Touka, Nemu...
Can you explain what you guys were trying to do?
I think I have an idea of what it was...
But I'm not entirely sure,@so I'd like to know the details.

group_1.textRight: Seeing that moment you two self-destructed was@traumatizing...

group_1.textLeft: We didn't mean any harm.

group_1.textRight: I did tell you my reservations...

group_1.textLeft: That's not fair! You can't just@put this on me, Nemu...
Still, what did you figure out, Ui?
You and Nemu knew about@the Will of the Universe...

group_1.textRight: Ding ding ding! Gold star for you!

group_1.narration: "We were trying to spread the truth about@Magical Girls via social media and similar means,@but it had absolutely no effect, right?"
"After that, Nemu and I investigated@the trends of Magical Girls everywhere@in conjunction with crimes, accidents,@and other incidents involving the police."
"From there, we began delving into various@histories, and started getting this vague@notion of the so-called Will of the Universe."
"Of course, as with Kyubey's claims regarding@the heat death of the universe or the history@of Magical Girls, there is no definitive way@to prove that the Will of the Universe exists."
"But given our intentions of spreading@the truth of Magical Girls, we needed to@avoid that possible risk. Thus, we decided@to make an exit until it was safe to act..."

"Our actions to make public the existence@of Magical Girls risked us becoming targeted@by the Will of the Universe. To avert this,@we believed that if we took our next moves after@Iroha and Ui gained extraordinary power,@we would be able to put up a strong resistance."
"However, even though we were trying to@remove ourselves, we were concerned we'd@still be subject to the Will of the Universe@as long as we were still Magical Girls."
"And so I used the last of my power to create@a [textBlue:Rumor] that would have us lie dormant as Uwasa,@enabling us to materialize under certain conditions."
"That is to say, Iroha was required to gather@the [textYellow:Kimochi], and Ui needed to recapture the@Automatic Purification System."
"That also served as a safe situation for us."
"Ui came to these same realizations as we did,@and volunteered to serve as our core of her own accord.@This allowed us to unite with Sister,@thus fulfilling all of the needed conditions."
"Needless to say,@I can breathe easy now."

group_1.textCenter: Erm, so does that mean you two@aren't Magical Girls anymore...?

group_1.narration: "We are the Uwasa Queens,@ones who create Rumors@via conversion and manifestation."
"Just like how Nemu provided the Eternal Sakura@with magic power, we're now powered by@Iroha and Ui's magic."

group_1.textLeft: Huh?!
So it's just like Kagome and the@Uwasa of the Wind Evangelist...

group_1.textRight: You could say we're parasitizing you!

group_1.textLeft: But considering how Sakurako@is connected to Nemu...
Will your magic...last...?

group_1.textRight: The magic of the [textYellow:Kimochi] is immense, and now@it can be harvested and converted.
It's a perpetual motion machine now!@*Giggle*

group_1.textLeft: I-I see...

group_1.textRight: You could have explained that to us before@you made yourselves explode...

group_1.textLeft: Right...
Had we been given a bit more explanation, our@course of action would be completely different...
We didn't have a choice, though?
Incidents and accidents involving Magical Girls@are obscure to the public.
Even if you try bringing them into broader@consciousness, they're left ignored.
And had we tried unraveling the history of Magical@Girls, we'd likely wind up like my uncle.
This was all we could do.

group_1.textRight: Though we believe in the existence@of the Will of the Universe,
you can choose to either surrender and adhere@to that will, or risk your life to resist it.
Hence, we chose to demonstrate our@resistance without speaking of it,
so that we could see whether our resistance@or your resignation would win out.

group_1.textLeft: We wanted to prevent the Will from knowing@our intentions as much as possible.
*Giggle*

group_1.textRight: We're not Magical Girls anymore, but if@it's still able to prevent this reversal,
